company_profile.name: MIT Digital
company_profile.tagline: Accelerate Growth with AI-Powered Automation & Digital Innovation
company_profile.description: MIT Digital is a results-driven digital agency and educational institute. We help businesses scale through AI automation, advanced web development, and data-driven marketing, while also providing top-tier IT education to the next generation of developers.
company_profile.location: New Shalimar Colony, Bosan Road, Multan, Pakistan

digital_services.name: AI Automation & Voice Agents
digital_services.description: Intelligent automation solutions designed to replace manual work with smart systems.
features: Human-like Voice Agents for inbound/outbound calls

digital_services.name: WordPress Development
digital_services.description: Scalable, SEO-friendly, and secure WordPress websites built for business growth.

digital_services.description: High-performance web applications built with modern code stacks for maximum speed and scalability.

digital_services.name: Shopify Store Development

educational_courses.description: Hands-on practical training to help students earn their first dollar online.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We are located at New Shalimar Colony, Bosan Road, Multan, Pakistan.

faqs.question: Do you offer AI automation for small businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our AI solutions are scalable. We can build simple chatbots or complex voice agents depending on your business size and needs.

faqs.question: Do you offer online classes?
faqs.answer: We primarily focus on Physical Classes to ensure hands-on mentorship and a professional environment, but please contact us for specific online availability.

faqs.question: What is your mission?
faqs.answer: Our mission is twofold: To help businesses grow through digital innovation, and to provide a safe, innovative atmosphere for students to learn skills and earn their first income.

faqs.question: Do you require long-term contracts for agency work?
faqs.answer: No. We believe in earning your trust through results. We offer flexible engagement models without locking you into long-term binding contracts.

faqs.question: How do you measure success?
faqs.answer: We are data-driven. We track success using real-time analytics, ROI reports, and clear performance metrics like traffic growth, lead volume, and sales conversions.
